pages.text: You will know everything about ocelot organs here.

pages.title: Ocelot Ribs
pages.text: Ocelot Ribs add speed II to your Gulber.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the ocelot ribs.

pages.title: Ocelot Heart
pages.text: Ocelot Heart randomly spawn ocelot when your Gulber is attacked.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the Ocelot Heart.

pages.title: Ocelot Muscle
pages.text: Ocelot Muscle add slowness to attacked entity.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Here is the recipe for the Ocelot Muscle.
